Package com.adobe.platform.operation.pdfops.options.createpdf

Contains the option classes for CreatePDFOperation.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CreatePDFFromHTMLOptions
    Parameters for converting HTML to PDF using CreatePDFOperation.
    CreatePDFFromHTMLOptions.Builder
    Builds a CreatePDFFromHTMLOptions instance.
    CreatePDFOptions
    Marker base class for CreatePDFOperation options.
    PageLayout
    Class for specifying the layout of a page.

Package com.adobe.platform.operation.pdfops.options.createpdf Description

Contains the option classes for CreatePDFOperation.
